AboutSection.Section1: Hello I'm Tait Wayland. I've been doing UI design and development for about 3 years. I'm a product designer at TicketBiscuit. I formerly captained a Code for America brigade,

sections.title: User Research
sections.description: Start with solid understanding of users and their needs. Wireframe. Prototype. Validate with user tests. Iterate and improve. Rinse and repeat.

sections.title: Mobile Design
sections.description: Design with Sketch. Prototype with Invision. Paying respect to Android and iOS design documentation.

sections.title: Responsive Design
sections.description: Responsive sites, built with atomic design principles. Living style guides and all that jazz.
